# Part V: Becoming Someone Who Knows and Acts Well {.unnumbered}

Smart decisions don’t come from perfect data — they come from wise decision-makers. In this final section, we focus on who you are becoming: someone who integrates knowledge, judgment, and faith. We’ll explore lifelong learning, belief revision, and the spiritual side of entrepreneurship.

We’ll cover:

- How faith and revelation inform decision-making
- Building habits of judgment and epistemic humility
- Becoming a leader of faith, intellect, and character
- Where to go from here
